hero.heading: Market Research Company in (countryName) — Creative Consulting Services Limited (CCSL)
hero.paragraph:
Creative Consulting Services Limited (CCSL) is a leading full-service market & social research and fieldwork partner in (countryName) with operational coverage across APAC & GCC. We specialize in consumer, healthcare, B2B, automotive, financial services, FMCG, retail, and development/NGO research, delivering end-to-end qualitative and quantitative solutions.
Our teams combine local language expertise, nationwide field logistics, and modern research technology (CATI/CAWI/CAPI, online & mobile qual, dashboards, and advanced analytics) to turn questions into clear, decision-ready answers—from concept to implementation.
hero.focusText: Standards & Ethics: We follow the ICC/ESOMAR International Code for Market, Opinion & Social Research and Data Analytics. Participant consent, privacy, and multi-layer quality control are embedded in every project.

whyClientChoose.heading: Why Clients Choose Creative Consulting Services Limited (CCSL):
list: Strong field operations in (countryName) : vetted recruiters, trained interviewers/moderators, centralized scheduling, secure data handling.
Multi-mode, fit-for-purpose design: Survey, FGDs, IDIs, ethnography, CATI, CAWI, CAPI, online communities, mobile diaries.
Quality you can verify: live monitoring, call/listen-backs and consented recordings, GPS/time-stamps, 100% critical back-checks.
Actionable outputs: concise narratives, clear visuals, and prioritized recommendations—not just data dumps.

whatWeDo.heading: What We Do:
list: Quantitative Research (CATI, CAWI, CAPI, Online).
Qualitative Research(FGDs, IDIs, Ethnography, Online Qual, Semiotics).
Data Collection & Fieldwork in (countryName) (nationwide recruitment, survey, moderation, logistics & QC).
Mobile Research(diaries, photo/video ethnography, geo-tasks).
Panels & Communities (always-on audiences, re-contact studies).
Biometrics & Neuromarketing (Eye-Tracking, Facial Coding, Wearables).
Analytical Services (Big Data, Data Mining, Statistical Modeling).
Social & Digital Analytics vetted recruiters, trained interviewers/moderators, centralized scheduling, secure data handling.
Research Software (scripting, portals, dashboards, ETL/API).

howWeWork.heading: How We Work (Concept → Completion)
list: Brief & Objectives clarify the problem, KPIs, markets, and timelines.
Design & Sampling method mix, incidence & quotas, discussion guide/questionnaire, compliance plan.
Recruitment & Scheduling screeners, verification, reminders, venue/tech setup.
Fieldwork Execution moderators/interviewers, stimulus handling, live client access.
Quality Controlconsented monitoring/recordings, back-checks, fraud/duplicate checks, GPS/time-stamps.
Analysis & Insight stats modeling, thematic coding, frameworks (What/Why/Now-What).
Delivery & Enablementdatasets, dashboards, reports, and an action plan.

OurResearch.heading: Our Research Solution or Services:
list: Analytical Services (Big Data, Data Mining, Statistical Analysis)
Data Collection / Field Services (CATI, CAWI, FGD, IDI, PAPI, CAPI)
Support Services (Incentives, SaaS Platforms, Scanning Services)

QuantitativeResearch.heading: Quantitative Research (CATI • CAWI • CAPI • Online)
list: Purpose: size markets, track KPIs, and validate decisions with statistical confidence.
Applications: U&A, segmentation, concept/pack tests, brand & comms tracking, pricing, ad effectiveness, CSAT/NPS, shelf/planogram.
Process: sampling & quotas, scripting with logic/validations, mixed-mode execution, real-time dashboards, weighting & significance testing, regression/driver analysis, MaxDiff, Conjoint, TURF.
Deliverables: SPSS/CSV/XLSX datasets, tabs/banners, dashboards, and executive report with clear recommendations.

QualitativeResearch.heading: Qualitative Research (FGDs • IDIs • Ethnography • Online Qual • Semiotics)
list: Purpose: uncover motivations, barriers, language, and cultural meanings to shape propositions and communication.
Applications: idea exploration, product/pack refinement, messaging, patient/HCP journeys, shopper missions, UX/usability, cultural decoding.
Execution: targeted recruitment, senior moderation, projective/creative tasks, in-facility/in-home/shop-along, online or offline FGDs/IDIs, mobile diaries.
Deliverables: transcripts & translations, verbatim packs, highlight reels, thematic maps, personas/journeys, and action frameworks.

PanelsCommunities.heading: Panels & Communities:
PanelsCommunities.subHeading: Build and engage always-on audiences for faster, iterative learning.
list: We handle: in-the-moment diaries, path-to-purchase, mystery shopping, OOH checks, product trials.
Toolkit: app/web tasks, photo/video uploads, barcode/QR scans, geo-fenced assignments, opt-in passive metering.

MobileResearch.heading: Mobile Research:
list: Use-cases: in-the-moment diaries, path-to-purchase, mystery shopping, OOH checks, product trials.
Toolkit: app/web tasks, photo/video uploads, barcode/QR scans, geo-fenced assignments, opt-in passive metering.
Deliverables: rich media galleries, journey timelines, location heatmaps, rapid pulse insights.

BiometricsNeuromarketing.heading: Biometrics & Neuromarketing (Eye-Tracking • Facial Coding • Wearables):
BiometricsNeuromarketing.subHeading: Measure attention and emotion to optimize creative, packaging, UI, and shelf layouts.
list: Methods: gaze plots, heatmaps, time-to-notice, sequence analysis; emotion valence/arousal traces (where applicable).
Outputs: attention maps, emotion timelines, priority-of-notice, and concrete optimization guidance.

AnalyticalServices.heading: Analytical Services (Big Data • Data Mining • Statistical Modeling):
list: Techniques: data cleaning/integration, EDA, clustering/segmentation, predictive modeling, driver analysis, churn/propensity, price elasticity, demand estimatio MaxDiff, Conjoint, TURF, text analytics & topic modeling.
Visualization: interactive dashboards, automated KPI trackers, cohort views, and story-first decks.
Deliverables: codebooks, models/scoring files, dashboards, and an action plan.

SocialDigitalAnalytics.heading: Social & Digital Analytics:
SocialDigitalAnalytics.subHeading: Social listening, trend & sentiment analysis, topic clustering, influencer/KOL mapping, creative benchmarking, and campaign lift indicators.
list: Use-cases: crisis alerts, brand health monitoring, category trend spotting, competitor tracking.

ResearchPlatformScripting.heading: Research Platform and Scripting:
list:
Platform: Survey To Go, Survey CTO, Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, Kobo Toolbox and our client platforms (i-field and n-field and others),
Survey scripting/hosting (CATI/CAWI/CAPI), respondent portals, dashboarding, automated ETL/API pipelines, data vaults.
Security: role-based access, encryption at rest/in transit, audit logs, backups.

EngagementModelsClients.heading: Our Engagement Models with Clients:
list: Full-Service: research design → fieldwork → analysis → reporting
Field & Tab: fieldwork execution + tabs + datasets
Recruit-Only/Facility-Only: if our client have your own moderators.
Consultancy: problem framing, methodology design, stakeholder workshops.
